summary.span: 表示 Unicode 字符的 UTF-7 编码。

span.span: Represents a UTF-7 encoding of Unicode characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 编码是将一组 Unicode 字符转换为一个字节序列的过程。Encoding is the process of transforming a set of Unicode characters into a sequence of bytes. 解码是将编码字节序列转换为一组 Unicode 字符的过程。Decoding is the process of transforming a sequence of encoded bytes into a set of Unicode characters. UTF-7 编码将 Unicode 字符表示为7位 ASCII 字符的序列。The UTF-7 encoding represents Unicode characters as sequences of 7-bit ASCII characters. 此编码支持某些协议，其中的某些协议是必需的，最常见的是电子邮件或新闻组协议。This encoding supports certain protocols for which it is required, most often email or newsgroup protocols. 因为 UTF-7 不是特别安全或可靠，并且大多数新式系统都允许8位编码，所以通常应首选 utf-8。Since UTF-7 is not particularly secure or robust, and most modern systems allow 8-bit encodings, UTF-8 should normally be preferred to UTF-7. > [!NOTE] > 不提供错误检测。 does not provide error detection. 出于安全原因，应用程序应使用 、或 并启用错误检测。For security reasons, the application should use , , or and enable error detection. 有关 支持的 UTFs 和其他编码的详细信息，请参阅[.NET Framework 中的字符编码](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-encoding.md)。For more information about the UTFs and other encodings supported by , see [Character Encoding in the .NET Framework](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-encoding.md). 方法确定导致对一组 Unicode 字符进行编码的字节数，并且 方法执行实际编码。The method determines how many bytes result in encoding a set of Unicode characters, and the method performs the actual encoding. 同样， 方法决定了多少个字符会导致对一个字节序列进行解码，而 和 方法执行实际解码。Likewise, the method determines how many characters result in decoding a sequence of bytes, and the and methods perform the actual decoding. 对应于 Windows 代码页65000。 corresponds to the Windows code page 65000. > [!NOTE] > 如果使用不同的 .NET Framework 版本对对象进行序列化和反序列化，则不会保留 UTF-7 编码对象的状态。The state of a UTF-7 encoded object is not preserved if the object is serialized and deserialized using different .NET Framework versions. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 对 Unicode 字符串进行编码，并将其存储在字节数组中。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to encode a string of Unicode characters and store them in a byte array. 请注意，在将字节数组解码为字符串后，不会丢失任何数据。Notice that when the byte array is decoded back to a string, no data is lost.
